dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7026 IH: ID for EBT Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grothman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to require States to include a photograph on electronic benefit cards issued to provide supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ID for EBT Act of 2022.
Section 7(h)(9) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2016(h)(9)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the heading by striking Optional and inserting Mandatory;
in subparagraph (A) by striking may and inserting shall; and
in subparagraph (B) by striking If and all that follows through (A), the and inserting The.

section.text: This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
